education.institution: Narsee Monjee Institute of Management and studies
education.degree: B – Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

responsibilities: Implemented a system for detecting and generating Aruco markers using OpenCV, including both single and bulk marker generation.
Developed a calibration tool to detect and capture images of a chessboard pattern for camera calibration.
Created a detailed simulation environment for a Husky robot in Gazebo.
Applied visual servoing techniques to control and navigate the Husky robot based on visual feedback.

projects.name: Show Ticket Booking System
description: Created a web application for seamless ticket booking.
Designed and implemented user signup forms and integrated Razorpay payment gateway.
Built a responsive and user-friendly interface.
Managed user feedback with dynamic HTML pages.

projects.name: College Sports Fest Registration
description: Created a web application for real-time event filtering and registration.
Designed a user registration form with client-side validation.
Ensured cross-device compatibility with responsive design principles.

projects.name: Snake Game Python
description: Built a fully functional Snake Game.
Created multiple classes to modularize the game components.
Enabled user control of the snake through keyboard inputs.

achievements.description: Achieved a score of 25.86/100 marks and ranked 20,646 out of 123967 students in GATE CSE’24 Examination.
Solved over 150 problems on LeetCode and Code360 of Data Structures and Algorithms.
Cleared the Cambridge Preliminary English Test (PET) with a B1 grade.
